    • Method Detail

      • complement

        public static double complement(Resource r,
                                double v,
                                Filter f)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Complements the filtered value of a filter, with a initial starting value.

        Preconditions:

        1-The resource is not equal to null.
        2-The value is between 0 and 1.
        3-The filter is not equal to null.

        Postconditions:

        1-The complement is done correctly returning a value between 0 and 1.

        Parameters:
        r - The resource you want to filter.
        f - The filter you want to use for filtering.
        v - The starting initial filtering value.
        Returns:
        the complement of filtered value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • complement

        public static double complement(Resource r,
                                Filter f)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Complements the filtered value of a filter.

        This method do a complement passing value 1 as inital value to the filter during filtering.

        Preconditions:

        1-The resource is not equal to null.
        2-The filter is not equal to null.

        Postconditions:

        1-The complement is done correctly returning a value between 0 and 1.

        Parameters:
        r - The resource you want to filter.
        f - The filter you want to use for filtering.
        Returns:
        the complement of filtered value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • max

        public static double max(double... number)
        Returns the maximum value of a list of double values.

        You can set a variable number of values or directly an array of values.

        Preconditions:

        1-The input value can't be null.
        Postconditions:

        1-It's returned the maximum value of the list of values.

        Parameters:
        number - The list of values between you want to find the maximum.
        Returns:
        the maximum value of the list of values.

      • min

        public static double min(double... number)
        Returns the minimum value of a list of double values.

        You can set a variable number of values or directly an array of values.

        Preconditions:

        1-The input value can't be null.
        Postconditions:

        1-It's returned the minimum value of the list of values.

        Parameters:
        number - The list of values between you want to find the minimum.
        Returns:
        the minimum value of the list of values.

      • sum

        public static double sum(double... values)
        Returns the sum of a list of double values.

        You can set a variable number of values or directly an array of values.

        Preconditions:

        1-The array can't be null.
        Postconditions:

        1-It's returned the sum of the list of values.

        Parameters:
        values - The list of values for which you want to calculate the sum.
        Returns:
        the sum of the list of values.
